import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Menu, Input, Button, Row, Col, Card, Avatar, Form } from 'antd' const dummy = { nickname: '조승현', Post: [], Followings: [], Followers: [], isLoggedIn: false, } /* children == Props 같은 의미로 쓰인다! */ const AppLayout = ({ children }) => { return (
노드버드 프로필 {/* // xs : 모바일, sm : 작은화면, md : 중간화면, lg : 큰화면 ( 가로 너비 기준 ) */} {dummy.isLoggedIn ? 짹짹
{dummy.Post.length}
,
팔로잉
{dummy.Followings.length}
,
팔로워
{dummy.Followers.length}
, ]} > {dummy.nickname[0]}} title={dummy.nickname} /> :


} {children} 세번째 ) }; AppLayout.propTypes = { children: PropTypes.node, } export default AppLayout;
